name: My UK Virtual Assistant
description: My UK Virtual Assistant has been running since 2012, so you can be certain that all our UK Virtual Assistants are experienced and dedicated to supporting businesses. You don't need to worry about language barriers, time differences, arranging travel, booking UK venues, UK communication etiquette and all the other concerns that arise from hiring an overseas VA. Â We track the exact time taken to complete each task, so you don't have to worry about being overcharged.
